alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Greene; Montgomery; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:59PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW... HAZARDS...A cluster of snow showers with moderate to heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 457 PM EST, a cluster of snow showers with moderate to heavy snow was over Schoharie, or 7 miles east of Cobleskill moving southeast at 40 MPH. THIS AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Berne around 510 PM EST. Westerlo around 520 PM EST. Ravena and Selkirk around 535 PM EST. Castleton-On-Hudson around 540 PM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 23 and 24. Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 23. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 4. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
